question: Who of the following has become the first director to gross more than $10 billion at the box office?
explanation: Three-time Oscar winning filmmaker Steven Spielberg has become the first director to gross more than $10 billion at the box office. Spielberg's latest film 'Ready Player One' has helped him achieve this milestone. Spielberg is unlikely to lose the top spot any time soon as his closest rivals - Peter Jackson, Michael Bay and James Cameron all are currently around the $6 billion figure.
